law.text:
As used in this chapter, unless the context requires otherwise:
"Hotel" means any hotel or inn, and includes an apartment hotel wherein furnished or unfurnished apartments are rented for fixed periods of time and the proprietor, if required, supplies food to the occupants; and
"Proprietor" means the proprietor, manager, lessee or operator of a hotel.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2176a-2.
